column4: how would one enable dual core cpu support on Natty?  Ubuntu puts me in SMP mode with only one of my cpu cores appearing at half clock speed.
how do you know it's only showing one
where does that show it's only using 1 core
pastebin the full output of /proc/cpuinfo please.
cat /proc/cpuinfo and put it in a pastebin
sudo apt-get install pastebinit && cat /proc/cpuinfo | pastbinit
the clock spead is not a massive issue as powerscaling can effect it,
just reading through the dmesg output
0.000000] Booting paravirtualized kernel on bare hardware
that interests me, but I've not quite worked out the relevence yet
it's not a kernel issue, I don't believe
still reading trying to understand what's failing
I'd recommend against it, but ok
